text.p: Lithuanian newspapers carried the following reports in their Thursday editions. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Lithuanian Economy Minister Zenonas Kaminskas says inflation in 1996 will not exceed 20 percent and that GDP will grow by 3.4 percent.
- Lithuanian and Italian Chambers of Industry and Commerce signed a cooperation agreement.
- Lithuanian gas company Lietuvos Dujos owes Russian natural gas concern Gazprom $15.6 million and $14.7 million to gas supplier Stella Vita'e.
